Class Tickets

  • java.lang.Object
    • daewoo.management.system.gui.Tickets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    commonInterface

    public class Tickets
extends java.lang.Object
implements commonInterface
    This is the class Tickets which perform operations on the file and store data regarding the tickets
